subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Jose Valverde allowed a game-tying three-run homer to Raul Ibanez in the bottom of the ninth, Anthony Recker homered in the 13th, lifting the Mets past the Angels.
snippet: After Jose Valverde allowed a game-tying three-run homer to Raul Ibanez in the bottom of the ninth, Anthony Recker homered in the 13th, lifting the Mets past the Angels.
